Update_Resolved_Date_Time NICC 047510 NICC 046786 Resolved_DateTime__c /* ALL BASED ON CHANGE OF CASE STATUS */ IF ( /* RESOLVED DATE/TIME IS NULL AND STATUS IS VALID (SET TO NOW) */ AND( ISBLANK(Resolved_DateTime__c), CONTAINS("Resolved - Pending Customer Confirmation:Closed:Duplicate:Platform Completed", TEXT(Status)) ), NOW(), /* RESOLVED DATE/TIME IS NOT NULL AND STATUS IS VALID (DO NOT SET TO NOW) */ IF ( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Resolved_DateTime__c)), CONTAINS("Resolved - Pending Customer Confirmation:Closed:Duplicate:Platform Completed", TEXT(Status)) ), Resolved_DateTime__c, /* STATUS WAS VALID BUT NO LONGER VALID (SET TO NULL) */ IF ( AND ( CONTAINS("Resolved - Pending Customer Confirmation:Closed:Duplicate", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status))), NOT (CONTAINS("Resolved - Pending Customer Confirmation:Closed:Duplicate:Platform Completed", TEXT(Status))) ), NULL, /* DEFAULT TO EQUAL SELF (SET TO NULL) */ Resolved_DateTime__c ) ) ) Update Resolved Date Time false Formula false false
